meanings.definition: To change or alter patterns or habits.
meanings.sent1: She is repatterning her daily routine to include more exercise.
meanings.sent2: I repattern my thoughts to be more positive every morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat is repatterning its nap spots around the house.
meanings.sent4: After the storm, nature began repatterning the landscape with new growth.
meanings.sent5: The artist is repatterning the canvas with bold strokes of color.
